title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Science Teacher Professional Development Using Observation-Based Reflective Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three core elements of teacher-learner interaction by observing science classes.
Learners can write reflective journals based on observed class cases and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can apply a collaborative instructional design model through peer assessment and feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
